title: Client Manager
job_overview:
We’re a U.S.-based immigration law firm looking for a Client Success Specialist to join our remote team. In this role, you'll be the first point of contact for prospective clients—answering inquiries, providing service information, conducting basic eligibility screenings, sending contracts, and guiding clients through the onboarding process.

Qualifications:
At least 2 years of experience in sales, with a strong track record of closing deals
Basic understanding of U.S. immigration (business or family-based - preferred)
Strong communication and organizational skills
Detail-oriented, responsive, and client-focused
Comfortable with or open to learning sales/client management

What We Offer:
Competitive base pay + performance bonuses
Remote work flexibility
Growth opportunities in a mission-driven firm
